newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian bank Bancoquia gets new name.
newsitem.headline: Colombian bank Bancoquia gets new name.

text.p: Colombian bank Bancoquia was renamed Banco Santander Colombia Thursday to reflect its imminent takeover by the Spanish banking group.
The decision, adopted at a shareholders' meeting, follows the last month's announcement of Banco Santander SA's agreement to acquire a 55 percent stake in Bancoquia for $146 million.
The takeover is expected to be completed before July 30.
Medellin-based Bancoquia, Colombia's eighth largest commercial bank in terms of assets, is the financial arm of the powerful Julio Mario Santo Domingo conglomerate.
